column4: hello, just a simple question.. how do I set mplayer as the default player ?
right-click on a media file and choose too always open the file with the player of your choice
doesn't have that option ? isn't that the m$ feature= =?
i use the swedish ubuntu, but is called somethin like "preferences"
there is a tab called "open with"
but it doesn't set as default tho...
in that tab, you can MAKE IT default
not rightclick>open with , rightclick > PREFERENCES >open with
not rightclick>open as , rightclick > PREFERENCES >open as
wait... there's no open as in preference
if you click a media file it is
thanks for the help... highly appreciated
great now YOU have to hang around here answering the same question over and over again =)
